text: Julio Peña (18 June 1912 - 27 July 1972) was a Spanish actor. He appeared in more than one hundred films from 1930 to 1972. He died on July 27, 1972 aged 60 in Marbella, where he was resting after appearing in the film Horror Express. ==Filmography== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Year ! Title !
